foodArray.name: Tomato Basil Soup
foodArray.ingredients: Tomatoes, basil, garlic, onion, vegetable broth, salt, pepper
foodArray.recipe: 1. Saute onions and garlic. 2. Add tomatoes and broth. 3. Simmer and blend. 4. Add basil, salt, and pepper.

foodArray.name: Spinach Artichoke Dip
foodArray.ingredients: Spinach, artichokes, cream cheese, sour cream, garlic, parmesan cheese
foodArray.recipe: 1. Mix all ingredients. 2. Bake until bubbly. 3. Serve with chips or bread.

foodArray.name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
foodArray.ingredients: Chicken, fettuccine pasta, Alfredo sauce, garlic, butter, Parmesan cheese
foodArray.recipe: 1. Cook pasta and chicken. 2. Make Alfredo sauce. 3. Combine and garnish with Parmesan.

foodArray.name: Garlic Roasted Brussels Sprouts
foodArray.ingredients: Brussels sprouts, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper
foodArray.recipe: 1. Toss Brussels sprouts with garlic and oil. 2. Roast until crispy. 3. Season with salt and pepper.

foodArray.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
foodArray.recipe: 1. Melt chocolate and butter. 2. Mix with sugar, eggs, and flour. 3. Bake until the center is gooey.

foodArray.name: Mango Smoothie
foodArray.recipe: 1. Blend mango, yogurt, banana, and honey. 2. Add ice and blend until smooth.

foodArray.name: Butternut Squash Soup
foodArray.ingredients: Butternut squash, onion, carrot, vegetable broth, cinnamon, nutmeg
foodArray.recipe: 1. Roast squash, onion, and carrot. 2. Blend with broth. 3. Season with cinnamon and nutmeg.

foodArray.name: Stuffed Mushrooms
foodArray.ingredients: Mushrooms, cream cheese, garlic, breadcrumbs, parsley
foodArray.recipe: 1. Remove mushroom stems. 2. Mix cream cheese, garlic, and breadcrumbs. 3. Stuff mushrooms and bake.

foodArray.name: Beef Stir-Fry
foodArray.ingredients: Beef strips, broccoli, bell peppers, soy sauce, ginger, garlic
foodArray.recipe: 1. Stir-fry beef. 2. Add veggies and sauce. 3. Cook until beef is browned and veggies are tender.

foodArray.name: Quinoa Salad
foodArray.ingredients: Quinoa, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, feta cheese, olive oil, lemon juice
foodArray.recipe: 1. Cook quinoa. 2. Mix with veggies, feta, oil, and lemon juice. 3. Chill before serving.

foodArray.name: Tiramisu
foodArray.ingredients: Ladyfingers, coffee, mascarpone cheese, cocoa powder, eggs
foodArray.recipe: 1. Dip ladyfingers in coffee. 2. Layer with mascarpone mixture. 3. Dust with cocoa powder.

foodArray.name: Pomegranate Mojito
foodArray.ingredients: White rum, pomegranate juice, mint leaves, lime, soda water
foodArray.recipe: 1. Muddle mint and lime. 2. Add rum, pomegranate juice, and ice. 3. Top with soda water.

foodArray.name: Creamy Broccoli Cheddar Soup
foodArray.ingredients: Broccoli, cheddar cheese, onion, milk, chicken broth, butter
foodArray.recipe: 1. Saute onions in butter. 2. Add broccoli and broth, simmer until tender. 3. Blend, add cheese and milk.

foodArray.name: Caprese Skewers
foodArray.ingredients: Cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, fresh basil, balsamic glaze
foodArray.recipe: 1. Thread tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil onto skewers. 2. Drizzle with balsamic glaze before serving.

foodArray.name: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
foodArray.ingredients: Shrimp, linguine pasta, garlic, white wine, lemon, parsley
foodArray.recipe: 1. Cook pasta. 2. Saute shrimp and garlic, add wine and lemon juice. 3. Toss with cooked pasta.

foodArray.name: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes
foodArray.ingredients: Potatoes, roasted garlic, butter, milk, salt, pepper
foodArray.recipe: 1. Boil potatoes, mash with roasted garlic, butter, and milk. 2. Season with salt and pepper.

foodArray.name: Strawberry Shortcake
foodArray.recipe: 1. Slice strawberries and sweeten. 2. Layer with shortcakes and whipped cream.

foodArray.name: Mint Lemonade
foodArray.ingredients: Lemons, sugar, water, mint leaves, ice
foodArray.recipe: 1. Squeeze lemons for juice. 2. Mix with sugar and water. 3. Add mint leaves and serve over ice.
